forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers, with winds diminishing for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. SW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers, with winds diminishing for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 53F. SW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
